document.full_text: world number one caroline wozniacki was the biggest casualty on a day of shocks at the madrid open on wednesday, falling in the third round to unseeded german julia goerges for the second time in two weeks.
document.title: top seed wozniacki ousted by goerges in madrid
lines_and_colors: world number one caroline wozniacki was the biggest casualty on a day of shocks at the madrid open on wednesday, falling in the third round to unseeded german julia goerges for the second time in two weeks.
